Description: String of 68 graduated globular cornelian beads dark yellow to dark red.
Curator's comments: Provenance not specified in the Museum register, but probably from Tell Nabasha if not from Tell Dafana, according to the context of the item in the list, or Gumaiyima. Concerning stone and glass beads from Tell Dafana, see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 79 § 79.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 79 § 79)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.85, p.187, pl.29)
